diseases.name: Powdery Mildew
diseases.symptoms: White powdery spots on leaves and stems
diseases.solution: Apply sulfur-based fungicides and ensure proper plant spacing for air circulation

diseases.name: Late Blight
diseases.symptoms: Dark lesions on leaves with white fungal growth under moist conditions
diseases.solution: Remove infected plants, apply copper-based fungicides, and avoid overhead watering

diseases.name: Fusarium Wilt
diseases.symptoms: Yellowing and wilting of lower leaves, vascular discoloration
diseases.solution: Use resistant varieties, practice crop rotation, and solarize soil

diseases.name: Bacterial Leaf Spot
diseases.symptoms: Small, water-soaked spots that turn brown or black with yellow halos
diseases.solution: Remove infected leaves, avoid overhead watering, and apply copper sprays

diseases.name: Root Knot Nematodes
diseases.symptoms: Galls or knots on roots, stunted growth, yellowing plants
diseases.solution: Solarize soil, use nematode-resistant varieties, and practice crop rotation

solutions.solution: Maintain consistent soil moisture and add calcium to the soil
Use neem oil spray or introduce natural predators like birds
